step_5.text: Help customers to get a first impression of ​​you and your shop.
step_5.text_extra_points: A video is worth a thousand pictures. If you already have one from your shop, just paste the link here. If not, you can add one later.
step_5.text_shop: The people in your neighborhood will recognize your shop - especially from the outside. Upload a photo of your shop front here to increase the recognition value.
step_5.text_you: You and your team are what makes your shop unique. Show the community who you are so your customers know who they are dealing with. Alternatively you can also upload a picture of your shop's interior.
step_5.title: Photos and Videos
step_5.you_photo: Picture of you, your team or the interior of your shop
step_5.yt_link: Youtube link to a short video of your shop

success.text1: Together we have taken the first big step towards digitalizing your shop. You should be proud of that!
success.text2: But this is only the beginning. Set up your new shop by adding your first products.
success.text3: Then use our Lokabees Academy to learn step by step how to be successful online without any previous knowledge!
success.text4: You can change the settings you have made at any time under `My Profile`.
success.title: Congratulations, your shop is now online!
